original_title: Encantadeiras - O Canto e o Encanto das Quebradeiras de Coco Babaçu
overview: The Encantadeiras is a group formed by a group of babassu coconut breakers from Maranhão. The film accompanies the 7 women on a tour and unveils the story of each one. Babaçu, feminism, land reform and music. A lot of music.
title: Encantadeiras - O Canto e o Encanto das Quebradeiras de Coco Babaçu
